title: Laurel District  Junior 1 BR/1 BT in Tri-Plex
posting_body: ['Cozy junior one bedroom, one bath apartment on the lower level of a 3-unit split-level house in Oakland’s vibrant Laurel District', 'Spacious eat-in kitchen with lots of countertop and cabinet space.', 'New gas range, refrigerator, bath vanity, toilet, paint, light fixtures, and flooring throughout (no carpet).', 'Large shared backyard garden set-up for organic gardening.', 'The garden currently produces raspberries, blueberries, artichokes, pears, Meyer lemons, and loquats.', 'No on-site laundry.', 'No pets.', 'Street parking only.', 'Gas wall heater.', 'Bath shower stall.', 'Building is wired for AT&T and Sonic.', ' Unit has AT&T broadband.', '380 Square Feet', 'Minimum Qualifications:', '- Credit Score:  760+.', '- Must have verifiable monthly income of at least 2.5X the monthly rent.', '- Housing, employment, and personal references required.', '- A $25 non-refundable credit check fee must be submitted with application per person.', '- No previous evictions or unlawful detainers', 'Terms:', '- $1500 per month', '- One year lease', '- Security Deposit: $3000', '- Tenant pays cable, internet/Wi-Fi/phone.', '- PG&E, EBMUD, Garbage/recycling, lawn care included with rent.', '- Renters Insurance & renter’s liability policy required', '- This is a non-smoking property.', 'No smoking allowed in units or building common areas.', '- Tenants may NOT sublet/rent out unit, in whole or in part, on AirBnB, VRBO,', 'or any other “sharing” service.', '- All applicants must visit in person before applying.', 'No long-distance, sight-unseen rentals.', 'We ask that you drive by the property to acquaint yourself with the street, neighborhood, and exterior of the building.', 'BRE Lic.', '# 01831923']
